item.title: Pi Zero Plant Humidifier
item.description: I have some plants (philodendrons) that are a bit demanding about humidity, and I want to make sure they don’t dry out and have ample humidity to grow optimally. To solve this, I considered a number of solutions, including finding some ZigBee capable humidifier that I could control with Home Assistant. I didn’t find anything like that and even if such a product existed, it would probably be prohibitively expensive because it’s for a niche of niche.
